posts.post_content:
Original card stock glossy album page for the Detroit Tigers from the valuable Tomas Gutierrez cigarette card album.  Back is blank with just a small advertisement for Tomas Gutierrez cigars.  Features Harry Heilman.  These are usually very expensive but I got this one in a trade and can let it go for about $165 shiiped.

Rhys
